Uses of Class
org.ggp.base.util.propnet.architecture.PropNet

  • Packages that use PropNet 
    Package Description
    org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory  
    org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory.converter  

    • Uses of PropNet in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory

      Methods in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory that return PropNet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PropNet PropNetFactory.create(java.util.List<Gdl> description)
      Creates a PropNet from a game description using the following process: Flattens the game description to remove variables. Converts the flattened description into an equivalent PropNet.
      static PropNet OptimizingPropNetFactory.create(java.util.List<Gdl> description)
      Creates a PropNet for the game with the given description.
      static PropNet OptimizingPropNetFactory.create(java.util.List<Gdl> description, boolean verbose) 
      static PropNet OptimizingPropNetFactory.create(java.util.List<Gdl> description, boolean verbose, OptimizingPropNetFactory.CondensationOption condensationOption, CondensationIsolator.CondensationIsolatorConfiguration ciConfig, OptimizingPropNetFactory.SplitterOption splitterOption) 
      Methods in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory with parameters of type PropNet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void OptimizingPropNetFactory.lopUselessLeaves(PropNet pn)
      Optimizes an already-existing propnet by removing useless leaves.
      static void OptimizingPropNetFactory.removeAnonymousPropositions(PropNet pn)
      Potentially optimizes an already-existing propnet by removing propositions with no special meaning.
      static void OptimizingPropNetFactory.removeInits(PropNet pn)
      Optimizes an already-existing propnet by removing propositions of the form (init ?x).
      static void OptimizingPropNetFactory.removeUnreachableBasesAndInputs(PropNet pn) 

    • Uses of PropNet in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory.converter

      Methods in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory.converter that return PropNet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PropNet PropNetConverter.convert(java.util.List<Role> roles, java.util.List<GdlRule> description)
      Converts a game description to a PropNet using the following process (note that this method and all of the methods that it invokes assume that description has already been flattened by a PropNetFlattener): Transforms each of the rules in description into equivalent PropNet Components. Adds or gates to Propositions with more than one input. Adds inputs that are implicitly specified by description.
